snippet: Orlando Cruz, the first openly gay fighter in professional boxing, failed in his bid to gain the World Boxing Organization featherweight title.
abstract: Orlando Cruz, first openly gay fighter in professional boxing, fails in his bid to gain the World Boxing Organization featherweight title.
lead_paragraph: Orlando Cruz, the first openly gay fighter in professional boxing, failed in his bid to gain the World Boxing Organization featherweight title.

headline.main: First Openly Gay Fighter Loses Bout
